Description: Now leasing for Oct. 1, 2023 Brand new high end renovation in much sought after South Boston location just steps from public transportation. This designer unit features 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, high ceilings, hardwood floors, central A/C, washer/dryer in unit and luxurious finishes. Fully applianced chef's kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops. Outdoor Patio/yard. Short walk to red line stop and South Bay shopping plaza. Pictures are of another project developer has finished. Unit is under construction.
